package.name: HTML_QuickForm_DHTMLRulesTableless
package.summary: DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation using the tableless renderer
package.description: This is a DHTML replacement for the standard JavaScript alert window for client-side validation of forms built with HTML_QuickForm when using the HTML_QuickForm_Renderer_Tableless renderer.
package.notes: - this package is now in beta status, i.e. the API can be considered as stable - this package is now licensed under the New BSD license - end-user documentation is now available in the manual - bugfix: using $form->addGroupRule() caused a fatal PHP error - added an example for a group with group rules to the example file - added "$form->getValidationScript();" call to the example code (required for showing the errors immediately after changing/leaving a form field) - adopted stylesheet changes from the tableless renderer into the example file
